mama.title: Mama — the heart of the family
mama.description:
You give love, care, and warmth every day.
At Mameliya, we believe that to care for others, you must also remember to care for yourself.

Here you'll find:

Simple rituals for rest and recovery
Handy to-do lists and reminders to keep things under control
Ideas for small daily joys
Support and inspiration from other moms

Create a space where you're not just a mom — but also a woman with dreams, desires, and the right to take a break.

family.title: Family — a team where everyone matters
family.description:
Here you'll find everything to make family life a little easier and calmer:

A shared family schedule — so everyone’s on the same page
Ideas for family dinners and meaningful traditions
Tips for holidays, special dates, and everyday joys
Simple tools to help everyone feel heard

All to help your family feel like a true team.

A shared routine, ideas for quality time together, and a little bit of everyday magic —
So each day reminds you how good it feels to be together.

children.title: Children — little big wonders
children.description:
Here you can save the important moments of growth, mark the first steps, words, and achievements.

Everything about your little one — all in one place:

Track important milestones and little victories
Find ideas for games, activities, and magical evenings
Monitor growth, habits, and well-being
Preserve warm memories and funny moments

You’re there every day — and we help make this journey a little easier and cozier.

mentalHealth.title: Mental Health — Caring for Yourself Within
mentalHealth.description:
A space where you can pause and take a deep breath.

In this section:

Simple practices to calm and restore
A journal for your emotions and thoughts — to truly hear yourself
Supportive notes and reminders of what matters
A cozy place for inner balance

You are important. Caring for yourself is not a luxury — it’s a necessity.

Let this be the place where your journey of gentle self-care begins.

rituals.title: Beauty Rituals — A Loving Time Just for You
rituals.description:
Little moments that help you feel good:

Personal care — from your hair to your fingertips
Gentle reminders and trackers to keep it consistent
Tips and inspiration without pressure
A space where beauty means care, not perfection

Let self-care become a comforting ritual, not an obligation.

Sometimes, all it takes is listening to your feelings to reconnect with your true self.
This is a space for a kind dialogue with yourself and quiet inner shifts.

 You matter. You deserve care — not just for others, but for yourself too.

mama.click_to_change_mood: Click on the icon to change mood
mama.stop_and_listen: Here you can pause for a moment and listen to yourself.
mama.select_your_mood: Select your mood, jot down a few thoughts about how you feel, and keep this moment saved.
mama.appear_mood_history: This creates your personal mood history — a warm space you can return to, read through, and see how your days, thoughts, and feelings have changed over time.
mama.say_your_mood: Sometimes, simply naming your state can bring relief. Over time, you’ll start to better understand your inner cycles, notice when self-care is especially important, and cherish the moments of warmth and joy.
